test.doc: Try to login with an unknown user and validate that the login attempt was unsuccesful

suite.doc: This file contains the third test case to code for the spriteCloud automation challenge: Write a validation for a failed log in.
This init file will be run before every single file within the same folder. This allows some repetitive task to be just written once.
